strings.Value: "Greetings, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. I have come to applaud the success of your rule. These wild lands grow more and more civilized, and my workshop thrives. I can obtain high-quality raw materials for my creations."

"Greetings, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! It's encouraging to see your lands thrive so. The population grows, and becomes more organized, and there's more trade of knowledge with our neighbors and with far-away lands. My workshop's supply has also improved. I can now experiment with certain rare materials and techniques."
"I'd like to present to you one of my latest creations. It is the embodiment of things I have oft spoken."

Greetings, my {mf|baron|baroness|King|Queen}! I am now well known as a master craftsman, and it's all due to your support. My fellows see it as an honor to assist the court weaponsmith. The local community grows and develops, and with it my craft evolves as well."

"Greetings, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! As you know, your country's prosperity and relations with other nations have a positive effect on my craft as well. I've learned much from craftsmen who visit from distant lands, and have managed to procure rare crafting materials."
"I would like to express my gratitude with this special gift."
